price: 我把我的养主的使命传达给你们，并且忠告你们，我从安拉〔的启示中〕知道你们所不知道〔的道理〕。
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنصَحُ لَكُمۡ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anṣaḥu lakum wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
